message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  What do you say?
Let's meet in the middle, 60-40 is fair!
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think 70/30 is a better split. Let's make this happen!
Come on, 55-45 is a good compromise. Don't be greedy!
We're getting closer.  65/35 is my final offer before the inflation hits us both harder.  Let's make this deal!
I'm willing to meet you closer, 52-48 is as high as I'll go.
We're both losing money with each round. Let's end this fairly with 60/40. It's the best we can do now.
